title: Use external URL for Home Hero background image

requirements.summary: Switch the Home page Hero background image from the generated static asset to the provided external URL while preserving the overlay gradient, layout, and ImageWithFallback behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero background image request uses exactly https://i.postimg.cc/rsn7SfgZ/IMG-20260214-021314.jpg as the image src.
The Hero section overlay gradient (darkening layer) remains applied on top of the background image.
If the external image fails to load, the existing ImageWithFallback placeholder/fallback UI renders instead of a broken image.
No other sections (Visual Trust, About, Benefits, Support, Footer) have their images changed as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Update the Hero background ImageWithFallback src to use exactly "https://i.postimg.cc/rsn7SfgZ/IMG-20260214-021314.jpg" instead of getGeneratedAssetUrl(...). Keep the existing overlay gradient layer, layout classes, and ImageWithFallback usage so the same placeholder/fallback UI appears on load/error. Remove the now-unused getGeneratedAssetUrl import to keep the file clean.
